name: playwright
description: Playwright Automation Framework Using Cucumber as test runner and using PactumJs for automation API TC's

scripts.My comments 1: pretest --> for executing any command before the actual test, here used to run init.ts file which is used check the presence of test-results folder
scripts.pretest: rimraf ScreenShots && rimraf src/test/helper/testData/systemInfo.json && npx ts-node src/test/helper/report/init.ts
scripts.My comments 2: test --> by executing 'npm test' the command with test is executed
scripts.My comments 3: posttest --> for executing any command after the actual test, here to create a custom html report
scripts.My comments 4: test:failed --> by executing 'npm run test:failed' all the failed scenarios alone is executed which stored in @rerun.txt file
scripts.My comments 5: posttest:failed --> for executing any command after the rerun of failed tests i.e. test:failed, here to create a custom html report
